column4: howdy, I just installed ubuntu and am having a problem with my video
I have an nvidia card, would the driver be the most likely problem, if so how would I fix it
check the howto posted up there to verify if you have the right settings for your particular card
why not just folllow the wiki -- time and effort has already been put into it
well, check, and double check -- if at that stage you still cant find it-- then ask us
